info.name: Test Case Management API
info.description:
Comprehensive API collection for Test Case Management System with RAG and AI capabilities.

Version: 1.0.0
Created: 2025-11-04

This collection includes scenarios for:
- Manual test case creation (without AI)
- RAG-only (semantic search and reference)
- Generative AI with RAG (combined approach)
- Pure Generative AI (without RAG)

Base URL: http://localhost:3000

‚ö†Ô∏è Note: Example credentials in requests are placeholders. Use your own test credentials or environment variables.

item.name: Health & Monitoring

request.description: Check if the backend service is running and healthy
Get detailed health information with system metrics
Get Prometheus metrics in text format
Simple ping endpoint for load balancer health checks

item.description: Endpoints for monitoring service health and metrics

item.name: 1. Manual Test Case Creation (Without AI)

request.description:
Scenario: Manual creation of a test case without any AI assistance.

This demonstrates the traditional approach where QA engineers manually create test cases based on requirements.
Scenario: Manual creation of a negative test case for login validation.
Scenario: Manual creation of functional test case for file upload feature.

item.description: Manual test case creation without AI assistance. This is the traditional approach where test cases are created entirely by humans.

item.name: 2. RAG Only (Semantic Search & Reference)

request.description:
Scenario: RAG - Semantic search to find similar test cases.

Use case: QA engineer wants to find existing test cases related to login before creating a new one. The semantic search uses RAG to understand the context and find relevant test cases.
Scenario: RAG - Find test cases related to file upload using semantic similarity.

item.name: Create Test Case with Semantic Search Reference

request.description:
Scenario: RAG - Create a test case based on semantic search result.

Use case: After finding a related login test case through semantic search, create a logout test case that references it. This maintains traceability and context.

Scenario: RAG - Retrieve a test case with its reference information.

This shows the relationships between test cases established through semantic search.

Scenario: RAG - Get complete test case details including all incoming and outgoing references.

Use case: Understanding the full context and relationships of a test case.

Scenario: RAG - Create a derived test case from an existing one.

Use case: Creating variations of existing test cases while maintaining the reference to the original.

item.name: Add Manual Reference Between Test Cases

request.description:
Scenario: RAG - Manually add a reference between two test cases.

Use case: Linking related positive and negative test cases.

item.description: RAG-only scenarios using semantic search and reference management without AI generation. This demonstrates using existing knowledge (Retrieval-Augmented) for test case organization.

item.name: 3. Generative AI with RAG

body.raw:
{
  "prompt": "Buat test case untuk fitur change password user",
  "context": "Aplikasi web dengan sistem autentikasi. User harus login terlebih dahulu sebelum bisa change password.",
  "preferredType": "positive",
  "preferredPriority": "high",
  "useRAG": true,
  "ragSimilarityThreshold": 0.7,
  "maxRAGReferences": 3
}

request.description:
Scenario: AI + RAG - Generate test case using AI with RAG context (preview only, not saved).

Use case: 
1. System searches for similar test cases (login, authentication)
2. Uses those as context/examples for AI
3. AI generates new test case following the patterns from existing ones
4. Result is more consistent and follows best practices from existing test cases

RAG Benefits:
- Better context awareness
- Consistent patterns with existing test cases
- More detailed and realistic steps

item.name: Generate and Save Test Case with RAG

exec: pm.test("Test case has RAG metadata", function () {

body.raw:
{
  "prompt": "Buat test case untuk reset password dengan email verification",
  "context": "User lupa password dan perlu reset melalui email. Sistem akan mengirim link reset password ke email yang terdaftar.",
  "preferredType": "positive",
  "preferredPriority": "high",
  "useRAG": true,
  "ragSimilarityThreshold": 0.65,
  "maxRAGReferences": 5
}

request.description:
Scenario: AI + RAG - Generate and immediately save test case with RAG enhancement.

How RAG works here:
1. System searches for similar test cases (email, authentication, validation)
2. Retrieves top 5 most relevant test cases
3. Sends them as context to AI (Gemini)
4. AI uses these examples to generate better test case
5. Test case is saved with RAG reference metadata

Advantages:
- Follows established patterns
- More realistic test steps
- Better coverage based on similar test cases

body.raw:
{
  "prompt": "Buat test case untuk user registration dengan validasi email format dan password strength",
  "context": "Aplikasi e-commerce yang memerlukan user registration sebelum checkout. Email harus valid dan password minimal 8 karakter dengan kombinasi huruf, angka, dan simbol.",
  "preferredType": "positive",
  "preferredPriority": "high",
  "useRAG": true,
  "ragSimilarityThreshold": 0.7,
  "maxRAGReferences": 3
}

request.description:
Scenario: AI + RAG - Generate registration test case.

RAG Enhancement:
- Finds similar authentication/validation test cases
- AI learns validation patterns from existing tests
- Generates comprehensive registration test with proper validation steps

body.raw:
{
  "prompt": "Buat test case untuk API endpoint GET /users/{id} dengan authentication token",
  "context": "REST API yang memerlukan Bearer token untuk autentikasi. Endpoint mengembalikan detail user berdasarkan ID.",
  "preferredType": "functional",
  "preferredPriority": "high",
  "useRAG": true,
  "ragSimilarityThreshold": 0.65,
  "maxRAGReferences": 4
}

request.description:
Scenario: AI + RAG - Generate API test case with authentication.

RAG helps by:
- Finding similar API/authentication test cases
- Learning proper API testing structure
- Including headers, authentication, status codes, response validation

item.description: Generative AI combined with RAG. This is the most powerful approach where AI generates test cases while leveraging existing knowledge from the database for better context and consistency.

item.name: 4. Pure Generative AI (Without RAG)

body.raw:
{
  "prompt": "Buat test case untuk fitur shopping cart - add to cart",
  "context": "E-commerce website dengan fitur shopping cart. User bisa menambahkan produk ke cart dari halaman detail produk.",
  "preferredType": "positive",
  "preferredPriority": "high",
  "useRAG": false
}

request.description:
Scenario: Pure AI - Generate test case using only AI without RAG context.

Use case: When you want completely fresh perspective or testing a new feature with no similar existing test cases.

Characteristics:
- No retrieval from existing test cases
- AI generates based purely on the prompt and general knowledge
- Good for new features without precedent
- May lack consistency with existing test patterns

body.raw:
{
  "prompt": "Buat test case untuk notification system - push notification",
  "context": "Mobile app dengan fitur push notification. User bisa menerima notifikasi tentang order status, promo, dan update.",
  "preferredType": "functional",
  "preferredPriority": "medium",
  "useRAG": false
}

request.description:
Scenario: Pure AI - Generate and save test case without RAG.

When to use:
- Testing completely new features
- No similar test cases exist
- Want AI's general best practices without bias from existing tests

Note: May need more manual review compared to RAG-enhanced generation.

body.raw:
{
  "prompt": "Buat test case untuk payment gateway integration - credit card payment",
  "context": "E-commerce checkout process dengan multiple payment methods. Test untuk credit card payment dengan 3D secure verification.",
  "preferredType": "functional",
  "preferredPriority": "high",
  "useRAG": false
}

request.description:
Scenario: Pure AI - Generate payment test case.

Pure AI is useful here if:
- First time implementing payment testing
- Want standard payment testing approach
- No existing payment test cases to reference

body.raw:
{
  "prompt": "Buat negative test case untuk form validation - SQL injection attempt",
  "context": "Web application dengan form input. Test untuk memastikan sistem aman dari SQL injection attack.",
  "preferredType": "negative",
  "preferredPriority": "high",
  "useRAG": false
}

request.description:
Scenario: Pure AI - Generate security test case.

Pure AI can be better for security tests because:
- Needs latest security testing practices
- Not biased by potentially outdated existing tests
- AI has broad knowledge of security vulnerabilities

item.description: Pure Generative AI without RAG. This approach relies solely on the AI's general knowledge and the provided prompt, without retrieving context from existing test cases.

item.name: 5. Test Case Management

request.description: Retrieve all test cases in the system
Get specific test case by ID
Update specific fields of a test case
Delete a test case by ID
Get all test cases derived from a specific test case

item.description: Basic CRUD operations for test case management

item.name: 6. Comparison Scenarios
Compare: Same Prompt - RAG vs Pure AI (Part 1 - RAG)

body.raw:
{
  "prompt": "Buat test case untuk user profile update - change email address",
  "context": "User yang sudah login dapat mengupdate email address di profile settings. Perlu verifikasi email baru.",
  "preferredType": "positive",
  "preferredPriority": "high",
  "useRAG": true,
  "ragSimilarityThreshold": 0.7,
  "maxRAGReferences": 3
}

request.description:
COMPARISON TEST - PART 1 (WITH RAG)

Generate test case with RAG enabled. This will:
1. Search for similar test cases (profile, email, update, authentication)
2. Use found test cases as context
3. Generate test case following existing patterns

Expected benefits:
- More consistent with existing test style
- Better structured steps based on similar tests
- References to related test cases

item.name: Compare: Same Prompt - RAG vs Pure AI (Part 2 - Pure AI)

body.raw:
{
  "prompt": "Buat test case untuk user profile update - change email address",
  "context": "User yang sudah login dapat mengupdate email address di profile settings. Perlu verifikasi email baru.",
  "preferredType": "positive",
  "preferredPriority": "high",
  "useRAG": false
}

request.description:
COMPARISON TEST - PART 2 (WITHOUT RAG)

Generate test case with Pure AI (no RAG). This will:
1. NOT search for similar test cases
2. Generate based purely on prompt and AI's general knowledge
3. No references to existing test cases

Expected characteristics:
- More generic approach
- May have different structure than existing tests
- Fresh perspective without bias

üîç Compare the results:
- Check the Console tab for comparison summary
- Review both test cases to see differences in:
  * Level of detail
  * Step structure
  * Consistency with existing tests
  * Completeness
  * References (RAG will have, Pure AI won't)

item.description:
Comparison scenarios to demonstrate the difference between RAG-enhanced and Pure AI generation.

Run both requests sequentially to compare:
1. RAG-enhanced generation (with context from existing test cases)
2. Pure AI generation (without context)

Check the test results and response bodies to see how RAG improves consistency and quality.
